resources.string: Your email address will be kept anonymous. We ask for your address to contact you for any actionable events that may arise in the future.\n

CorruptionTrak aims to deter corruption in India through the power of data supplied by the common man. We crowd-source corruption reports with the aim of exposing guilty authorities and organizations.\n\nPlease email us with your views, suggestions and enquiries at corruptiontrak@gmail.com
